function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limitations of filtration method","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Filter surface adhesion of particles reducing enzyme filter performance","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variable susceptibility of pathogens to uvgi based on cell wall presence and thickness","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of relative humidity on uvgi efficiency","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate room air mixing and uneven distribution of uv radiation","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High room relative humidity above 75%","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of uvgi system at higher air stream velocities","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Accumulation of \n’dad’ pathogens on contact surface reducing effectiveness of pco method","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Formation of secondary chemical species reducing indoor air quality","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Efficiency of voc removal not confirmed for airborne pathogens.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain impact on human health and air quality of plasmacluster ions technology pci .","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible misuse of essential oils in ventilation industry without proper evaluation.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hypersensitivity reaction of occupants to essential oils","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Toxicity of essential oils to human and microbial cells","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative effects of silver nanoparticles on health","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient data on minimum ventilation requirement for public premises","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Airflow patterns may contribute to the spread of diseases in occupied volumes.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for airborne cross-infection due to low air velocity and disturbance of boundary layer around individuals","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Elevated levels of resuspended particles in the room and within the convection flow","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resuspended particles brought into the breathing zone of the occupants","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resuspended particles of respiratory origin calculated for specific settling velocities and dry density of nonvolatile species in saliva","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Particles of respiratory origin being resuspended from the floor","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of inlet and outlet positions on particle deposition and airflow velocity","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of ventilation supply systems in a hospital environment","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Downward ventilation may not always protect people from cross-infection due to mixing ventilation and free convection around the human body.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Displacement ventilation performs worse when patients are lying sideways, leading to the persistence of exhalation jets over a long distance.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing the throw of the supply jet from the floor diffuser can deteriorate inhaled air quality and promote resuspension of particles including those carrying respiratory pathogens.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The proximity of people in densely occupied spaces increases the risk of disease transmission by contact and droplet transmission despite the use of dilution temperature.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Draught felt by people at high air flow rates from personalized air supply nozzles.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low velocity personalized ventilation system may not effectively mitigate the propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient air distribution indoors","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differentiated smart urban governance based on context and urban
